data.text: Ahead of our 75th birthday on Saturday, take the #UNDay quiz and test how much you know about our work around the world! https://t.co/Vx6VncMSqL #UN75 https://t.co/2sly4JcXzA

#FBF to 1946 and the first #UNGA session in Central Hall, London. 

Saturday's #UNDay will mark 75 years of the UN working on behalf of people everywhere. 

More on our history: https://t.co/m4imamTAPg #UN75 https://t.co/0pBLz4XMr3
